definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: The next layer in the atmosphere is thethermosphere named for its high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 中間層頂後是熱成層，它是因爲這裏的高溫而得名的。
